Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to hansgrohe home skill! With this skill you can control your Pontos devices from Hansgrohe. You can manipulate the valve and the profile of your Pontos Base and get all the information about temperature, humidity, etc. from your Pontos Scout. Also, you can choose any home that you have in the app and display rooms and devices in it.
To use this skill you need to have a Hansgrohe home account set up and Pontos devices linked to it. After setting it up you can interact with you devices using Alexa. 
You can start the skill by saying "Alexa, open hansgrohe home" and you will see the welcome message. After that you can start asking about your devices. For example, you can say "Alexa, give me a list of devices" and it will display you the devices you have. You can ask for a detailed information about your devices if needed. 
To execute some command on your device, you should simply tell what you want to Alexa. For example, "Alexa, open base valve" or "Alexa, tell me the temperature in the bathroom". If you have more than one device that fit the request, the skill will ask you to select the one you're interested in.
Another example of what you can do in this skill is changing profiles of your Pontos base. In case you want to see the list of available ones, simply tell "Alexa, show the list of profiles". Then ask Alexa to switch the profile to the one you want.
In this skill you can also view information about your home setup. For example, you can ask Alexa to list rooms, get emergency contact or switch the current home in case you have more than one home set up in the hansgrohe home app.
